DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe the method used to help stop smoking.

(from American Heritage Dictionary): An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Physician; a licensed medical practitioner.: The act of receiving professional guidance in resolving personal conflicts and emotional problems.

Concepts.definition: A doctor; a person who has been educated, trained, and licensed to practice the art and science of medicine; a practitioner of medicine, as contrasted with a surgeon.
The act of receiving professional guidance in resolving personal conflicts and emotional problems.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Therapeutic use of hypnotism.  It has been used to treat phobias and anxiety, to manage pain, and to extinguish habits and addictions. (Taber's): An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: The practice of piercing specific points on the body with very thin sterile needles in order to relieve pain or induce regional anesthesia.

Concepts.definition: Therapeutic use of hypnotism by a clinical professional.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not public; kept secret or restricted.: The use of operant conditioning, including rewards and punishments, in helping a person create an atmosphere where he or she does not contribute to painful stimuli.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Change To Low Toxic Residue Cigarette

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Change To Low Toxic Residue Cigarette
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: A minimum level or position or degree; less than normal in degree or intensity or amount.: Having to do with poison or something harmful to the body. Toxic substances usually cause unwanted side effects. : A single unit within a polymer; a recognizable molecular fragment embedded in a larger molecule.: Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.(NCI)

Concepts.definition: The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
A minimum level or position or degree; less than normal in degree, intensity or amount.
Having to do with poison or something harmful to the body. Toxic substances usually cause unwanted side effects.
A single unit within a polymer; a recognizable molecular fragment embedded in a larger molecule.
Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.
